title: Door micro-crack/crazing inspection (inside + outside)
instruction: Under bright light, inspect both sides of the door. Use angled viewing to reveal stress patterns. Any cracks/crazing/whitening/clouding = fail and do not operate.

title: Door edges and corners free from chips/impact damage
instruction: Inspect all edges/corners closely. Any chip, impact mark, or damage = fail and report.

title: Door engagement depth/seat unchanged
instruction: Close door and confirm it seats as normal with no new gaps. Compare with weekly photo if available.

title: Door retaining/guide system condition verified
instruction: Inspect guides/clamps/rails for wear, looseness, cracking, or missing parts. Hand-check only.

title: Upload required door photo set (monthly evidence)
instruction: Upload close-ups of: (1) full closed door view, (2) door edge close-up, (3) door surface close-up.

title: Window surface integrity check (inside + outside)
instruction: Inspect with angled light for cracks, crazing, scratches, star cracking, or delamination. Any defect = fail and do not operate.

title: Window perimeter/edge creep check
instruction: Inspect full perimeter for lifting, separation, gasket movement, compression, creep, or new gaps. Any change = fail.

title: Distortion/bowing appears normal under pressure
instruction: During the monthly video run, confirm window appearance under pressure is consistent with normal operation.

title: Upload required window photo set (monthly evidence)
instruction: Upload photos of each window from outside showing full perimeter. Include at least one close-up of edge/perimeter per window.

title: Leak test completed at door perimeter
instruction: Apply approved soap solution to door perimeter. Inflate to normal operating pressure. Check for bubbles. Any bubbles = fail and do not operate.

title: Leak test completed at window perimeters
instruction: Apply soap solution around each window perimeter. Inflate to normal pressure and check for bubbles. Any bubbles = fail.

title: Leak test completed at ports/penetrations/fittings
instruction: Apply soap solution around ports, valves, bulkheads. Check for bubbles at pressure. Any bubbles = fail.

title: Upload photo evidence of leak testing
instruction: Upload at least 1 clear photo showing soap solution applied and inspection in progress.

title: Main inlet valve condition verified
instruction: Cycle open/close slowly. Must operate smoothly with no binding.

title: Relief valve unobstructed, present, unmodified
instruction: Confirm relief/dump device is present, accessible, not taped/capped/adjusted, and outlet not blocked.

title: Emergency dump/release functional test
instruction: During a controlled test at low-to-normal pressure, activate dump briefly and confirm pressure vents smoothly. Stop if abnormal.

title: Gauge behaviour normal (smooth rise/fall, returns to zero)
instruction: Observe during pressurisation and depressurisation. Gauge must not stick/jump and must return to zero when fully depressurised.

title: Pressure hold test at normal operating pressure (5 minutes)
instruction: Inflate to normal operating pressure and hold for 5 minutes. Pressure should remain stable. Any instability/drift beyond normal = fail.

title: Abnormal noise check during full cycle
instruction: Listen for new hissing, cracking, popping, rubbing, or unusual noises during inflate/hold/deflate. Any unusual noise = fail.

title: Shell condition (hard-shell): corrosion, dents, coating damage
instruction: Inspect around welds, feet, penetrations, door ring area. Any corrosion/pitting/flaking coating or dents/bulges = fail.

title: Frame and supports stable (frame-supported models)
instruction: Confirm frame is stable, level, no rocking. Confirm clips/attachments intact.

title: No abrasion/rubbing points on soft-shell fabric
instruction: Inspect fabric where it contacts frame/floor/chair. Look for scuffs, thinning, abrasion, heat marks, or tears.

title: Zip track/teeth full inspection (monthly)
instruction: Inspect full zip length. Any missing teeth, separation, misalignment, or damage = fail and do not operate.

title: Seam/weld integrity inspection (monthly)
instruction: Inspect all seams, especially near penetrations and high-stress corners. Any peel/delamination/bubbling/lifting/tear = fail.

title: Base/foam/chair placement compliance (monthly evidence)
instruction: Confirm foam base is present and positioned correctly under the chair. If missing/damaged/incorrect, do not operate.

title: Visual electrical inspection (cables/plugs/extension use)
instruction: Inspect cables for cuts, crushed sections, exposed wires. Confirm no permanent extension-lead setup.

title: RCD test (if fitted/used)
instruction: Press TEST button on the RCD. Confirm it trips then resets correctly. If no RCD exists, select N/A and add note.

title: No oils/greases/unapproved sprays present
instruction: Confirm no oily residues, lubricants, aerosols, or creams near oxygen/air components and inside chamber.

title: Cleaning completed using approved methods only
instruction: Confirm cleaning completed and chamber is dry. Add note of cleaning agent used if required by site procedure.

title: Data plate/serial/ratings legible and present
instruction: Confirm serial and pressure rating label is present and readable. If missing, report.

title: Safety signage present and readable
instruction: Confirm signage (no oils/flames, max pressure, operator instructions) is present near the chamber.

title: Upload mandatory video evidence (30â€“60 seconds)
instruction: Record one continuous video showing: inflation start, gauge rising to operating pressure, door and windows visible under pressure, and normal depressurisation. Ensure chamber identity is visible if practical.

title: Monthly declaration accepted
instruction: I confirm all checks were completed accurately and truthfully. I understand inaccurate reporting, missed checks, or operating with defects may void warranty and may require inspection/service.
